description:
A new and handy desktop program, that will allow you to easily manage applications on your android device.

A new and handy desktop program, that will allow you to easily manage applications on your android device. You can disable unwanted pre-installed system apps and bloatware, or install new ones using a modern graphical interface. The program includes many useful tools and tweaks which allow you to get the better experience with your device. This is exactly the tool that you will use for many years - after trying ADB AppControl you will see that working with applications via adb has never been so easy.
1.8.5
- Updated adb and fastboot to the latest version 35.0.1
- Fixed a critical bug of saving apk as apks
- Fixed a rare bug when the process manager starting 
- Adb version 34.0.4 is automatically used for compatibility with Windows 7
- Fixed a problem with list sorting after exiting the apps installation menu
- Added installing apps with --no-streaming flag in case of an error
